thread.title: Brenda Lee Rivera
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Brenda Lee Rivera

author: Brenda Lee Rivera
title: Brenda Lee Rivera
text: I've came to town fair tire for many years and I have to say they are an incredible, professional, courteous, helpful Best tire center to go ever prices are unbeatable from tires to rims no doubt about that. I thank Edward at the Newington CT location for giving me the Best service. After working a long night I was running late I arrived and Edward received me with a smile put me through right away to get my tires installed and took the time to help me pick out some rims for my car. Edward is very knowledgeable in his work Thank You so much Newington Town Fair Tire you guys rock. By the way I have to give props to one of the Town Fair Tire worker who had a very rude costumer 2 thumbs up because he still kept being professional and kept cool and collective.
